TunableEnum.description: Tags for fish provider objects. When these objects are placed in the pond, they will share their fishing data (from the fishing location component) with the pond and all other fish provider objects inside the pond.

TunableTuple.name: FISHING_CONSTRAINT_DATA
TunableTuple.description: Data used to create the constraint for fishing in ponds. Please ask a GPE before changing these values.

Tunable.name: constraint_angle
Tunable.description: The angle of the cone constraint generated to constrain the sim relative to the fishing target location. This should be kept relatively narrow or else the distance between the sim and the target may appear to be smaller than tuned.

Tunable.name: distance_from_edge_to_fishing_target
Tunable.display: Distance From Edge To Fishing Target
Tunable.description: The distance from the edge to the fishing target location.

Tunable.name: edges_per_constraint
Tunable.description: The number of edges to skip between each constraint generated.

Tunable.name: facing_range
Tunable.description: The max angle offset (in radians), the Sim can face away from the target fishing location.

Tunable.name: max_distance_from_sim_to_edge
Tunable.display: Max Distance From Sim To Edge
Tunable.description: The maximum distance the sim can stand away from their constrained pond edge when fishing.

Tunable.name: minimum_constraints_per_pond
Tunable.description: Each pond will attempt to generate at least this minimum number of constraints. Minimum Constraints Per Pond is prioritized over Edges Per Constraint. If a pond doesn't have enough edges to meet the Edges Per Constraint requirement, that value will scale down automatically so that the constraints will still try to be evenly spaced while meeting the Minimum Constraints Per Pond requirement.

Tunable.name: near_in_use_target_max_distance
Tunable.display: Near In Use Target Max Distance
Tunable.description: The maximum distance a fishing target can be from an in use fishing target to warrant the 'near_in_use_target_scoring_penalty' scoring penalty.

Tunable.name: near_in_use_target_scoring_penalty
Tunable.display: Near In Use Target Scoring Penalty
Tunable.description: Scoring penalty for using a fishing target position that is near an in-use fishing target position. This is used to prevent sims from bunching up next to each other.

Tunable.name: slope_eval_distance
Tunable.description: The distance in front of the sim to test slope tolerance relative to the sim.

Tunable.name: slope_tolerance
Tunable.description: The allowed terrain height difference between the potential sim location and the slope eval location.

Tunable.name: target_min_water_depth
Tunable.description: The minimum water depth allowed for a fishing target location.

Tunable.name: INVISIBLE_FISHING_TARGET
Tunable.description: The invisible fishing target object that will be created at the water surface to play vfx.

TunableTuple.name: POND_CONSTRAINT_DATA
TunableTuple.description: Data used to make constraints for PondConstraintSuperInteractions. Please ask a GPE before changing these values.

Tunable.name: contour_grouping_max_distance
Tunable.description: The max distance away that a contour polygon is allowed to be from another contour polygon to group the two together.

Tunable.name: max_contour_polygon_clusters
Tunable.description: The max number of contour polygon clusters to use as the constraint.

Tunable.name: max_geometry_area
Tunable.description: The max area to use for the geometry of the constraint. Note that this is a soft restriction, and the actual max geometry area may be slightly larger than what is tuned.

TunableList.name: WADING_WALKSTYLE_WATER_DEPTHS
TunableList.description: The species-age mapping to wading depth minimum values. This will be used to determine at what water depth to replace the sim's walkstyle with the wading walkstyle.

TunableList.name: age_data
TunableList.description: The ages and their minimum wading depth.

TunableTuple.description: The ages and their minimum wading depth.

Tunable.name: minimum_wading_depth
Tunable.description: The minimum water depth to replace the sim's walkstyle with the wading walkstyle.

TunableEnum.name: species
TunableEnum.description: The extended species that this data is for.
